website_summaries.verdict: Deemed "sexier" than other casual sneakers, these versatile shoes can be dressed up, dressed down and worn anywhere.  Heavy, durable and distinctly European.
pros: Comes in a variety of colors
cons: May run large, so consider this when sizing
Not a lot of arch support

customer_reviews.title: Just as expected
customer_reviews.text: I scoured different supga sellers and this one seemed to have the best reviews - I was nervous about getting a counterfeit pair or that they wouldn't fit. I am a 7.5-8 and based on the reviews I ordered a 7.5 and they're perfect. In terms of comfort I think I will try to find some insoles that work with these since the current insole is pretty flat, comparable to converse. Visually they were perfect and unworn right out of the box, thankfully. Size down half a size and you will be happy, and as other people said these shoes are better for normal/wide feet.
customer_reviews.author: Jen Ellen

customer_reviews.title: Used/wardrobe program.
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are super cute! But I did not like the fact that they came in a bag and the soles of the shoes were dirty and with what seems to be pet hair. I believe these shoes were part of Amazon’s wardrobe program where they ship stuff so people can try them on and return if they don’t like them. I’m not gonna lie, I was disgusted. I received them today and I’m still thinking if I should return these shoes. The soles were the only thing that was dirty. Ughh
customer_reviews.author: Nidia

customer_reviews.title: Cute and comfy
customer_reviews.text: I walked all over NYC for 12 hours in these and they were some comfortable! Not only that they are super cute (cuter and fit better than classic Keds). I have wide feet and they are very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Sassy Sparky

customer_reviews.title: I love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes! The only thing that is not correct is the size, I already knew they run large, so I ordered half size smaller than my size ( I usually buy 37 UE / 6.5 US ) so be sure to do that if you're buying them. I got a grey pair which is super nice and I'll buy a blue one too hopefully soon!
customer_reviews.author: Federica

customer_reviews.title: great for lots of walking
customer_reviews.text: These are not quite as comfortable as a running shoe, but probably as close as you can get to a sneaker. They are a little bit heavier than I would have guessed but I did walk over 15 miles in them on two separate occasions and did not have any blisters or anything. I would definitely purchase another pair in the future
customer_reviews.author: Julie Ruelle

customer_reviews.title: Quality, comfy, cute sneaker
customer_reviews.text: These Superga shoes (gray women’s size 6.5) are exactly what I was looking for. I had gray Toms laceless canvas cordones for a long time and I loved them but they don’t sell them anymore. My Vans Lo Pros are all getting holes now too and so I am looking for some replacements. I found these Supergas on Zappos, but they cost $20 more on Zappos, so I ordered them via Amazon. The fit is exactly like my normal size. They are cuter and more comfortable than expected. I will probably get another pair in a different color.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Superb Superga!!!💛
customer_reviews.text: I can see why Superga is such a popular brand. There is a quality and fit that is unlike Converse or any other shoe Ive tried. These shoes are really superb. Truely, I hope tp get my kids some once they get a little older. I mean these shpes are so classy and chic yet trendy and casusal. Win win win. And they are a decent price point! The fit is right on. Love these and would buy again. Hopefully not any time soon though. I hope to have these for a long time!!!
customer_reviews.author: Brooke Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable except the shoe tongue
customer_reviews.text: They are a bit bigger than true size but they are comfortable. Although there isn’t much arch support, after hours of shopping, my feet are not tired. One negative part which is huge is the shoe tongue is really tough. It rubbed my skin so hard that I bled and got scars from it. I don’t know what it is about the tongue that does that. I still wear longer socks to cover that area which is not the best look.
customer_reviews.author: solemio2

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: These are comfortable and true to size (if you follow their sizing recommendations). I have somewhat wide feet and these were perfect, wore them on a day trip to Chicago in a very hot summer day, we took a walking tour of the loop and then walked around some more afterwards and my feet did not hurt and I didn’t get any blisters (miracle!).
customer_reviews.author: Eny Angulo

customer_reviews.title: All day, every day.
customer_reviews.text: These are my favorite casual shoes for year-round wear (in our temperate mid-Atlantic climate). This unisex version is definitely wider from the ball of the foot back, but doesn’t have much more wiggle room in the toe box than the women’s. I sized up from my usual 37 (6.5 US) this time-I typically buy the women’s 2750-and have significantly more room in the width but the length difference is negligible. My feet measure a 6.5E in standard US (5.5Y, 4.5UK) and I usually buy a 7B and modify. These actually fit a little more wide than I am normally comfortable with, but they don’t slip off and the price was unbeatable, so I’m keeping them.
customer_reviews.author: mavenmags

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and comfortable fit
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 1/2 size smaller and it was a perfect fit and great quality. I'm so glad I ordered these instead of Converse. I think these look better!
customer_reviews.author: KJ

customer_reviews.title: Heavy/Caused foot problem/“Hot spot”
customer_reviews.text: I’ve worn them for a little over a month a am probably throwing them out. These are way too heavy for walking daily. I felt silly when I first got them how heavy they were, but they looked nice and I needed new summer shoes. I walk alot during my commute and I ended up getting an injury in my heel. Also, I had to get a shoe stretcher to break these in and stretch out the wide in toe area. My feet are average with and a seam was rubbing painfully against my toe.
customer_reviews.author: Dana

customer_reviews.title: Love the way these look
customer_reviews.text: Love the way these look. The fit is a bit strange as they run wide but short. I needed a size larger but my daughter did not. I own them in pink and black and my daughter has the white. They don't have the support of a Birkenstock but are solid and comfortable. Beware of the seller you purchase from and where they are located and their return/exchange policy - I had a huge hassle and $15 return fee because my daughter ordered from a U.K. Non prime seller.
customer_reviews.author: Ann S.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice old school sneaker - Highly Recommend
customer_reviews.text: This is the 2nd size 9 I've ordered from Amazon and this shoe fit perfectly. The first size 9 I ordered was too short so I returned it and ordered a 9 1/2, The 91/2 was absolutely huge so it got returned too. I'm not new to this tennis shoe - I've worn size 9 in the past and loved the shoe sooooo, I took a chance and ordered a size 9 shoe again and it fit as expected. Apparently the first size 9 I received was mislabeled. I highly recommend this shoe.
customer_reviews.author: doggerfolk

customer_reviews.title: Great for Wide Feet
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these shoes. These are my third pair. They comfortable, well made and last a long time. They are also machine washable which is a huge plus. I have extremely wide feet to the point were wide width doesn’t fit and need to go a size wider. I understand how these shoes might not work for someone with narrow feet. I have also used them for waking around the theme parks and I wouldn’t recommend them for really long hours though. I ordered these in my size and have no issues with width or my original size. I would highly recommend them to someone.
customer_reviews.author: Lilly044

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe!
customer_reviews.text: I saw these shoes in an ad and being worn by people who could afford as much as they chose, but these were only around $40. I really wanted some shoes that would look good and be comfortable and these did it for me. I like that they don't feel tight at all, or loose. I usually wear a U.S. size 7 which is Euro 37 but I've bought other shoes that are a 37 and found them to be too tight, so I bought a 38. Perfect! This is also like one of the shoes being shown this year, so it's timely, too.
customer_reviews.author: P. Creasy

customer_reviews.title: Returned twice ... Small then used
customer_reviews.text: I have now ordered this shoe twice. The first time I listen to the other reviews and ordered a half size smaller which was a mistake. The second time the pair of shoes that came to me fit okay but we're a bit on the wide side and they were clearly used. The shoes were all marked up and had stains on them. I have now returned the shoe twice and I am so over it. I'm not going to bother with ordering it for the third time. It's a shame because I really do like these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Colby

customer_reviews.title: Fit is tricky.
customer_reviews.text: The information I had advised to order a smaller sized sneaker because of the way they fit. It indicated that the sneaker ran large and the next size up was a half size bigger than what I wear (size 7). I should have ordered my usual size (38) but I thought they would be sloppy. Well made, sturdy shoe otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Molly

customer_reviews.title: Love new shoes!!
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for some just plain white shoes for awhile but didn’t want something really plain with a little sporty look. I mean if Duchess Catherine can pull these off on Royal Engagements I figured I could pull them off just around my small town too 😁. First I ordered my normal sneaker size, an 8, but they were way to big. I returned them and ordered a 7.5. They are still a tiny bit big but I know I can’t go any smaller. But I am very happy with the way they look and can’t wait to wear them!!
customer_reviews.author: tarheels2004

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable right out of the box
customer_reviews.text: Been Living in These! Comfortable right out of the box. I'm a size 6, sometimes 6.5 US. Got the 37 and they're perfect. I had a previous pair of these in a 36 per the reviews to size down. They were tight and rubbed the pinky toe after a while. The 37's I can wear all day. Seems true to size to me.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Cute & fashionable but uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: I really want to love these BUT they are so uncomfortable. I ordered 3 pairs because I was worried about the sizing. I normally wear a 9 and ordered it along with the 8.5 and an 8 just in case. The 8.5 was the winner in fit but after a day at a golf tournament my feet were dying! Good thing I was wearing a sock or else I'd have blisters all over. I'm really bummed they didnt work out. All three are going back.
customer_reviews.author: Janet Crider

customer_reviews.title: Too Big, NOT True to size!
customer_reviews.text: When I buy online I always check reviews. Most all of the reviews talked up the product and said the sneaker fit true to size. Based on this i purchased my regular size which was 7.5. They were too large. I have been in London and bought shoes so I am aware of european sizing so that had no bearing on this item. It was just a huge disappointment as I was coveting these sneakers and found this price to be too good to pass up. And maybe that is the problem...
customer_reviews.author: Patty Webb

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy I bought these sneakers. Needed a new classic pair for the coming spring. I have slip on vans and adidas super stars, so these will fit right in as a classic pair to wear with all outfits. Would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: No middle ground
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure if the company makes half sizes, but I am stuck between a 38 being too small and a 39 too large. I am a true size 8, but for some reason these seem to run large. I kept the 39 because while there is a lot of room at the toe, they don't rub my heel and are still pretty comfortable to wear. I am planning on wearing them in Europe this summer, so that will be the real test..
customer_reviews.author: chihuahuamom

customer_reviews.title: No room for my toes
customer_reviews.text: I have some sort of emotional need to be able to wiggle my toes inside of my shoes Pointy-toed shoes are not in my wardrobe; not even sleek runners that taper at the end. However, I had read that, since these shoes are sized unisex (and are marked that way on the box), they would have a roomier fit. Not so. I have wider feet, and the fit across my instep to the ball of my foot area is okay. The toe box, despite the appearance of roominess in the photo, tapers sharply and pushes all of my toes together. I would never be able to walk far, comfortably, in these shoes. Disappointed and sending them back.
customer_reviews.author: Li B

customer_reviews.title: Wished they had fit!
customer_reviews.text: I see other women wearing these with jeans and dresses and think they look adorable. I bought both the US version of a 7 and a 7.5 (they do run big), and both were too wide in the heel. Every time I took a step, my heel slipped up, so I couldn't wear these. Cute shoes though, and they came impeccably clean and packaged perfectly. If you normally wear a size 7.5 in Sketchers or Nike running shoes, you will want the 7.
customer_reviews.author: Florida gal

customer_reviews.title: Too narrow for people who DON'T have wide feet
customer_reviews.text: I have NOT had a problem with shoes being too narrow but these were definitely too narrow. And, one shoe was MORE narrow than the other! Took them on a trip to Europe and one shoe rubbed and made a blister after only one day of wearing them. The other shoe was fine in size, other than it was too big. With this price I would never recommend these shoes. Guess I learned to not follow a bloggers recommendation lol
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Cheney

customer_reviews.title: Order Half Size Down
customer_reviews.text: I originally ordered my regular shoe size and they were far too large... even half size down they're a tiny bit loose but close enough. I love the classic look of these and they're relatively comfortable although they could use some arch support if you're wearing them for lots of walking. Idon't wear wide shoes but my feet tend towards the wider side and I don't find these to rub narrow like Keds. I'm really glad Amazon had these in my size at a fair price because everyone else seems to be sold out of them right now.
customer_reviews.author: Meg

customer_reviews.title: The sneakers which I purchased in red are comfortable and wide enough so that when my feet swell ...
customer_reviews.text: Even though the box says made in Italy my were made in Vietnam. It seems that they're made in various countries so the made in Italy on the box is just pot luck. The sneakers which I purchased in red are comfortable and wide enough so that when my feet swell from walking or flying make the perfect fit. Love the red and looking to purchase another color.
customer_reviews.author: Delia R.

customer_reviews.title: Looove these shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I looove these shoes! I wore my first pair out so I had to get a new pair. The only thing that would make them better is if they were waterproof/ dirt proof, so before I wear this pair I will be sealing them up so they will be easier to clean. I have wide feet so I usually have to size up, but with these shoes an 8.5 is perfect for me. I can walk in them all had with no pain, it’s wonderful!
customer_reviews.author: AshNSM

customer_reviews.title: Super cute!
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes. I teach kindergarten and I am on my feet all day. These shoes didn’t leave my feet hurting at the end of the day. They don’t have the best arch support, but my back and feet didn’t hurt, so I call that a win. They run slightly large. I normally wear an 8. I purchased an 8, but wish I would have bought a 7.5.
customer_reviews.author: sjt07

customer_reviews.title: Bought because Kate Middleton wears these
customer_reviews.text: When I saw an article citing these as shoes Kate Middleton wears, I was skeptical, especially when I saw the affordable price! I typically wear a US size 8 in sneakers, mostly due to my foot-width - I am not someone whose feet look cute in a classic Keds sneaker. I ordered these in a size 8 and found them to be surprisingly great width-wise but slightly long. I ordered a 7.5 replacement and struck gold. PERFECTION. So thrilled to have the ideal white sneaks for spring!
customer_reviews.author: inkytaffeta

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and cute sneaker!
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant on buying these because of sizing reviews. I measured my foot with wood ruler. My foot measured 9 inches and I ordered a 6. They are great with a nice pair of thick cotton no show socks. I’m normally a 5.5 or 6 in a sneaker. Love the look of this sneaker. They will be in my luggage traveling to Paris in the spring!
customer_reviews.author: V M

customer_reviews.title: Good Shoe For Many But Not For Me
customer_reviews.text: Most people rave over these shoes so I thought I would give them a try. They are cute but that’s where my compliments end. There is little support, very stiff, and I felt like I was walking in my bedroom carpet wearing combat boots. I’m glad they work for others. My feet scream NO!!
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Wrong size
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately I received the wrong size. I had ordered a a size 7 but received a 7.5. I am a small size seven so the seven and a half was way to big for me. I was very disappointed as I have previously had these and loved them. I did not return them as I am disabled and can not drive so I gave them to a friend of mine. So my two star rating is due to receiving the wrong size not due to the shoe itself.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Reilly

customer_reviews.title: These aren't much wider than Converse
customer_reviews.text: I tried these and a similar style in Converse. Both are too narrow in the toe for an ACTUAL WIDE FOOT. I bought these after reading reviews that claimed they were wider. In my experience they were a little bit wider, but not enough to be comfortable. I'm so bummed as they are REALLY CUTE and feel so well-made. I would buy them in multiple colors if they offered a true wide width sizing option.
customer_reviews.author: Smart Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Great for people with a wide foot. My fit was true to size.
customer_reviews.text: Fit perfectly! Well-made! I’m in love with the sneakers Kate Cambridge wears! I’m not sure if hers are made in China LOL but I will tell you they are comfortable with a low arch and wonderful for someone with a wide foot. I ordered my regular size 6 and it fits perfectly and I do have wide feet
customer_reviews.author: Margaret D.

customer_reviews.title: I love them
customer_reviews.text: I actually love the shoes and read the reviews and knew they would either fit because I ordered them a half a size too big or they would be a little big. It turns out they are a little big, particularly in the heel but they leave a lot of space to put the same kind of insole I use in my tennis shoes for tennis and for aerobics (power step) which is perfect! I love them!
customer_reviews.author: Lyle Hanna

customer_reviews.title: be careful on sizing
customer_reviews.text: Originally ordered my regular size and the toe box was nearly half size too big. returned and ordered half size down from my regular size, and a bit tight, but canvas should stretch, so fingers are crossed this works. Very good-looking shoe, look nice on.
customer_reviews.author: Autumn

customer_reviews.title: Nice...
customer_reviews.text: Very nice sneakers. Just a little tight the first few days then they stretched a little and now are comfortable. They are a little on the heavy side but not bothersome for me. Wore them two days in a row with a lot of walking involved and they gave me no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Foust

customer_reviews.title: Not as comfy as I had hoped
customer_reviews.text: I bought these based solely on the reviews and strong suggestion from bloggers when referencing shoes you can walk all over Europe in. After wearing them only once I decided not to take them to Europe on our trip. They weren’t the most comfortable shoe and I was not willing to risk it. I’ll still give them a chance but so far I’m not blown away. Average comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Serena

customer_reviews.title: Super comfy and cute too!!
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes. They’re so comfortable I walked in them all day on vacation and never felt foot fatigue or sore from them. They do however in my opinion run big. I wear a steady 6 in women’s and had to get the smallest European size they made and it’s still a little big - but I don’t care I love them!!
customer_reviews.author: SWVZ-6

customer_reviews.title: Fit true to size!!
customer_reviews.text: I love these sneakers now that I have the correct size. Description said to order a half to a whole size down because they run big. They do not run big!! They run true to size. Ordered a size 7 since I’m a 7.5 but those were too small. Exchanged for a 7.5 and they fit great! Super comfortable and cute!!
customer_reviews.author: B. Mozzicato

customer_reviews.title: These are perfect (when you add an insole)!
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes! I'm flat-footed, so the shoes straight out of the box were too flat. I added a Dr. Scholl Gel insole and I am in heaven. I bought them in navy as well and rave about them to anyone who will listen. You can't get me out of these shoes. I am wearing them today, at work, in a dress, and I don't care! My happy demeanor is worth all of the productivity! Buy these shoes in every color - I'm going to!
customer_reviews.author: Noreen S

customer_reviews.title: Did I receive a knockoff or used shoes?
customer_reviews.text: I’m so excited for these shoes! I saw them on Kate Middleton and thought they were the cutest casual shoe. I received them and I’m concerned that they are either used/refurbished or knockoffs. The bottom looks worn, it was not in the original packaging. Only one shoe had the Superga insert. There are scuffs on them. The fit seems to be right but the quality is questionable considering I’m not even sure if these are truly Superga shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Authentic.
customer_reviews.text: I received authentic white Supergas from Italy with no quality issues. Great shoes, even cute with dresses. They gave me horrific blisters the first time out, even with liners, so I took off a star for that. They are also heavier than they appear. Otherwise a good shoe, once broken in, and I'm going to order more colors.
customer_reviews.author: Cristina Cristina

customer_reviews.title: Not in love with them
customer_reviews.text: I find the Superga shoes kind of stiff, although they're very supportive. There's not enough arch support for my taste. I think they also make my feet look long and don't seem to work well with jeans. Surprised they're considered stylish.
customer_reviews.author: cm

customer_reviews.title: bad
customer_reviews.text: everyone made it seem like these shoes are super comfortable and good for wide feet, but that is definitely not the case ! i got the correct size, but the material in the shoe has cut my heels and toes badly. and yes, i tried wearing them for a couple of weeks to "break them in." i absolutely wish i had not bought these shoes. they're a waste of money. they hurt so bad. i'd rather wear high heels all day.
customer_reviews.author: softlillies

customer_reviews.title: Great price!  I love them!
customer_reviews.text: I read many reviews on Amazon and other purchasing sites, that stated these Superga run big. I typically wear an 8 - 8.5....but I ordered these in 38, which is a 7.5 in USA sizing....and the 38 fit perfectly. I've never seen these Superga for less than $65, anywhere.....so buying them for $43.02 + tax....is an outstanding price. I ordered the white.
customer_reviews.author: sansbeach

customer_reviews.title: Great spring/summer/fall shoe
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe that goes with everything. I bought them for the summer and was looking for a classic white sneaker I can wear with everything and this was it! I am usually a size 7 and got a size 6.5 because of the reviews. It isn't too terrible but if I were to buy another pair, I would NOT size down. Your feet expand over the course of the day. Don't size down.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: Cute but not the most comfy
customer_reviews.text: I like the look of these sneakers...classic and fresh! However, they are stiff, heavy, and a little narrow. I can wear them on a day spent on light errands, but not on a heavy walking day like to an amusement park or sight seeing. They are cute for now, but I could be easily convinced to replace them with a more comfortable version of a similar style.
customer_reviews.author: AnonInCA

customer_reviews.title: No wonder the princess wears them!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are perfect for those with wider feet yet don’t make your foot look wide. The sole is also not too thick so they flex easily at the toe joint and the sole doesn’t pull away from the shoe. Love these... so glad I bought them!
customer_reviews.author: Erin K Blackwell

customer_reviews.title: Instant return for l/o sanitary item received
customer_reviews.text: Found many black hairs (human?) covering the inside of these shoes. There were a number of hairs stuck on the outside of both shoes also. It was also apparent that the shoes had been worn
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and comfie
customer_reviews.text: Love! Love! Love! Had read reviews so expected a bit wider width than I need. However can lace up to compensate. Stylish, comfortable, well-priced. Exactly what I wanted for style and comfort. Have worn all day with lots of walking. Remained comfie whole time!!
customer_reviews.author: avid listener

customer_reviews.title: These are by FAR my favorite pair of go-to sneakers
customer_reviews.text: These are by FAR my favorite pair of go-to sneakers. They are super cute and very comfortable. I own several pairs and cannot recommend them any more highly to people who are considering purchasing a pair. There is lots of support (as the soles are not as paper-thin as typical sneakers of this type).
customer_reviews.author: Cindy L

customer_reviews.title: Was a gift:
customer_reviews.text: The product was delivered on time, packaging was in good condition, the product was in good condition and appeared to be as described, and after use met expectations for fit, form, and function.
customer_reviews.author: GM

customer_reviews.title: Great for some with wide foot but...
customer_reviews.text: I like the shoes. It fits well for wide feet but it doesn’t have much support for the heel. At first it feels heavy but it is similar to converse or Vann. I wore it the whole day and it doesn’t hurt my feet, toes or back. So far so good but wish it has a little support to the heel.
customer_reviews.author: KD

customer_reviews.title: Sadie the elder LOVES her Duchess Kate Sneaks
customer_reviews.text: There's nothing not to like about these shoes. They fit beautifully on my elderly, slightly bunioned feet. As sneakers they look really clean and classy; I feel like I can wear them anywhere. Good support, looking fine for all ages. I'm so glad that I bought them!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sadie

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable shoes
customer_reviews.text: The shoes seem to fit nice and they are fashionable, I haven’t had a chance to wear them yet so don’t know how my feet will feel after a long day. I can’t wait to wear them and show them off!
customer_reviews.author: DJean

customer_reviews.title: These are good looking sneakers
customer_reviews.text: These are good looking sneakers, and the color is awesome. But as is typical with unisex, there is a bit too much room across the widest part, causing a little bit of gaping. Arch support not great. I'm going to get some inserts and wear the heck out of these. Because all in all. They're cool.
customer_reviews.author: Alison Ordille

customer_reviews.title: Love them! Not easy to clean though.
customer_reviews.text: These are my favorite white sneakers. Perfect for summer dresses and just looking cute everywhere. They do get dirty fast, I wish they were easier to clean the dirt off. But I still highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: KL

customer_reviews.title: Like these, but
customer_reviews.text: I really like these shoes. They look good and fit well for the most part but the stitching or fabric on the tongue of the left shoe is heavier or maybe my foot is bigger there, but it rubs, definitely in the wrong place and makes the shoe almost unbearable.
customer_reviews.author: Queen Mom

customer_reviews.title: Perfect canvas shoe
customer_reviews.text: I had a pair of superga shoes a few years back and they were the most comfy canvas shoe I'd ever bought. I had to get these, but I had a terrible time finding the right fit online, the pair I bought was like 2 sizes to big. But, my guy tried them on and decided he wasn't giving them back. They are comfortable and the toe box is perfect. I am going to get a pair for next summer thought.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super Cute and Comortable
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE these shoes! In fact, I just bought another pair in another color. They're true to size, and comfortable to wear, and very cute! Wore them around New York City recently and didn't have any issue. With almost daily wear for two weeks they've held up perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: brook

customer_reviews.title: Well made, but not an accurate fit
customer_reviews.text: As suggested by several reviewers below, I ordered this shoe a 1/2 size smaller than I'd normally wear. Though the length was ok, the width was too tight around the ball of the foot. The sole did not provide much support either. Returned to sample another brand.
customer_reviews.author: Alisse

customer_reviews.title: My favorite plimsolls ever!
customer_reviews.text: I have been wearing these plimsolls for a long time. The last pair wore out so I ordered these. The price is great for these Superga shoes. They came really fast and are perfect! Be sure to add a couple light coats of scotchguard or crep protect to keep them looking great and repel stains.
customer_reviews.author: Misty Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Not comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I hate that I will be sending back. I tried them on and could tell instantly I would have several blister points. Not sure if they would break in but I won’t wear them if they hurt. So cute and wished they would have “been the ones.”
customer_reviews.author: Candace Fife

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: I seen this shoe on another person and loved it.. They were too wide and too big for me. I ordered my normal tennis shoe size. Returned but doesn't mean they won't work for someone else. Also, too heavy for me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute, good quality, but feel narrow
customer_reviews.text: These sneakers were really cute and seem well made, but they felt a little on the narrow side to me. I wear a standard US women's size 9 medium (B), but even trying them on with a thin sock they felt a little too narrow so I returned them. The return was handled very well in a timely manner, no concerns with the company or seller.
customer_reviews.author: Jean M

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes. They look classy.
customer_reviews.text: Go half a size bigger. They fit perfect with no socks but are tight even w/the thinnest socks. so if you wear socks in your tennis shoes go up 1/2 a size.
customer_reviews.author: Dolip

customer_reviews.title: Look great but feel different than last pai
customer_reviews.text: Make sure to get some kind of metatarsal pad or you will be miserable just walking around the house.last pair lasted That said I remain a supernatural fan
customer_reviews.author: Sheenaz

customer_reviews.title: Size not accurate
customer_reviews.text: A great product and comfortable but problem with size I usually wear size 8 men but when I tried it too large for me so I had to return ot and request 7.5 or 7 so just be careful with size
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Sizing is off
customer_reviews.text: These looked cute but they weren't very comfortable and are at least a half size too large in the heel while I wouldn't have gone any tighter in the toe box. I ordered a 36 which was labeled as the equivalent of US size 6. I'm a 6 in most flats, Keds, boots and a 6.5 in sneakers and these shoes were too large.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly O'Neal

customer_reviews.title: Super cute shoes that go with everything
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes, they have become a staple in my wardrobe. I ordered the white Supergas and let me tell you, they go with everything! Jeans, dresses, trousers, you name it! I'm happy i bought them. However, I read lots of mixed reviews on the sizing and fit of the Supergas and I originally went half a size smaller (size 6). When they arrived they were too small, so I ordered the next size up (6.5, which is my actual size) but they fit a bit large in the toe box and my foot slipped out with each step. Luckily, thick socks fixed that for me and i wear them on the regular now.
customer_reviews.author: Priscilla

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for myself and I love them. They have good support and they look nice. Amazon had them to me in a day which was even better!
customer_reviews.author: MSF

customer_reviews.title: I love these!
customer_reviews.text: SUPER COMFY! I have WIDE feet and these fit so well! They don't bulge like other shoes that aren't wide enough for me. They feel a little cushy but not too much. The laces are a little short, so you may need to buy your own if you like them to be a little longer. I have white so they get dirtier quicker but overall GREAT shoe!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: SUPER CUTE!
customer_reviews.text: Very cute shoes that literally go with anything! Bought these originally for the office since they look like a “grown up” low top converse but think I might wear them everywhere! Cloth on the body of the shoe is thicker than anticipated but very durable and flexible
customer_reviews.author: Yasmeen

customer_reviews.title: Superga 2750 Sneakers
customer_reviews.text: I ended up sizing down in these. I normally wear a 38, but there was way too much room in the heel area and my foot kept sliding up. The 37.5 fit much better, but was a bit too tight. I ended up returning both pair that I ordered. Mine also arrived with black spots all over the white shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph M

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable to the Max
customer_reviews.text: Possibly the most uncomfortable thing I’ve put on my foot in the last dozen years. I sent it right back.
customer_reviews.author: Laurine Laxer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice shoe but the fit didn't work for me.
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice old school shoe but the sizing didn't work for me. I usually wear a womens size 9. I ordered the 9 and the length was a bit short but otherwise the shoe fit nicely. I returned the shoe and ordered a 9 1/2 and the entire shoe was huge! So as much as I like the shoe, the fit didn't work for me.
customer_reviews.author: doggerfolk

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I highly recommend this shoe. i am very picky about shoe fit, and am very happy with this shoe. It is very comfortable and stylish.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Heavy sole, no support.
customer_reviews.text: I had hoped these were an updated version of the white Keds or Converse I wore back in the day, but their thick, heavy sole was too heavy to justify wearing a shoe this heavy with absolutely zero support in return.
customer_reviews.author: Clionah

customer_reviews.title: WRONG ITEM, received platforms not regular Cotus
customer_reviews.text: Everything about this item makes it look like they're the regular, classic Cotu style, yet the ones I received had stupid, giant platform soles. Absolutely nothing on here says they were platforms. Returning.
customer_reviews.author: Chocopepp

customer_reviews.title: bought for the style
customer_reviews.text: They are not uncomfortable but I doubt I will use them for long walks. No lining and minimal flat insole, a little rough. It took me a while to figure out the size, I am a US 7, bought 37.5 EU/7 US and it is a tad large on the heel. I am not sure if a smaller size would have been too small. I use with thick socks and tie them tight. But I love how they look. Sage is a medium gray with a little green in it.
customer_reviews.author: Lili

customer_reviews.title: Worst shoes I’ve ever worn!
customer_reviews.text: Worst shoes ever! Absolutely no support and my feet blistered from the toes to the middle of my arch. Wooden blocks on my feet could not have done worse. These were so uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Joanne L.

customer_reviews.title: Run a little big. But once you find your size are the shoes are wonderful
customer_reviews.text: These run a little big so I had to return to different times just to find my right size. I’m normally at 7 and ended up having to get a size 6. They were great about refunds and returning and it was super easy. I absolutely love the shoes they came perfectly clean and white and they feel great. I have a little bit wider feet that are also flat and these are very comfortable and stylish. I would highly recommend them
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Lubben

customer_reviews.title: Really cute
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are really cute. Just what I wanted. They do run a little large and are stiff. I think they will soften as I wear them.
customer_reviews.author: ann m clermont

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and economical
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes as they match everything and for the right price. Highly recommend. Note can't wear socks with these they are very tightly fit.
customer_reviews.author: Ella

customer_reviews.title: This is true to size!
customer_reviews.text: This is true to size. I wear size a 8, but based from the other reviews that it runs big, I followed the suggestion to size down and ordered 7.5. Please don’t!! The 7.5 is very snug and don’t have room to wiggle my toes. For reference, I wear size 8 too for Nike, Adidas, Converse & Sperry. I have to return & re-order for my real size.
customer_reviews.author: Macy T.

customer_reviews.title: Superga!
customer_reviews.text: My favorite “flat” sneakers. Pretty comfortable but not much arch support. Fit as expected. Nice color and great price.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth S

customer_reviews.title: Great looking shoe
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a 7, my usual size. They looked a bit big, but they fit fine. I do, however, have wide feet that make other shoe brands impossible to wear as they are too narrow. The heel is very thick and not very bendable. I do not plan to wear them for long walks, but rather around town. I love these for that and have gotten many compliments.
customer_reviews.author: HW

customer_reviews.title: Super Cute Sneaker but runs large
customer_reviews.text: I normally wear an 8.5 in women's shoes and this 8.5 was too large, so I returned it. Really cute and great quality though!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Fraley

customer_reviews.title: May need to add arch support
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for a trip to Italy. I read reviews on arch support so I added some extra arch support pads and these worked fine. They do slip a bit on heel but I think it’s because they run big. I would size down 1/2. My feet didn’t hurt at all and we walked 8 miles a day. So overall they are a good shoe. Everyone in Italy wears these:)
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Piwko

customer_reviews.title: disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I ordered my regular size and the shoe that arrived was at least twice as long and wide as I would have expected.....disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Dolly Maxwell

customer_reviews.title: cute..little too narrow
customer_reviews.text: nice shoe and looks good, my feet are barely, slightly, wide..not enough to need wide sizes, I just have to steer clear of brands that run narrow..i guess this is one of those brands. oh well it was worth a try, if they had fit I would be keeping happily..will keep looking for summer sneakers....
customer_reviews.author: H.S.

customer_reviews.title: Great fashion sneaker
customer_reviews.text: Great price ! Does run large . I bought normal size and had to reorder in next smaller size . Not meant for long walks but looks great with shorts skirts sundresses when you don’t want to wear a sandal
customer_reviews.author: Jayne In NY

customer_reviews.title: Cute shoe
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as a gift for my sister, she loves them! I thought they were so cute I bought my self a pair😊
customer_reviews.author: bugs

customer_reviews.title: Love these sneakers
customer_reviews.text: I love these sneakers. They fit great and look great. I'll probably get another pair in a different color
customer_reviews.author: MH

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: I'm usually a size 6 in womens but after reading reviews I sized down to a 5 and they fit perfectly. I was afraid they'd be too small but it's a perfect fit. Don't seem heavy and appear to be comfortable. Already ordered a second pair in black!
customer_reviews.author: ajhunsaker

customer_reviews.title: Great looking sneakers.  go 1/2 size down
customer_reviews.text: Great looking all purpose sneaker to wear with jeans, dresses, shorts. They come in all colors too. The white is the color I got as it will go with everything. Very comfortable after I broke them in a bit.
customer_reviews.author: L. Mengucci

product_meta.title: Superga Unisex 2750 Cotu Classic Sneaker
product_meta.description: Superga is the iconic Italian footwear brand for women, men, and children that has been a Mediterranean favorite since 1913. The supremely comfortable collection offers bright colors and an array of fabrics, including the Torino cotton canvas. The Superga casual chic designs features a lower-cut ankle for ease of movement and vulcanized natural rubber soles for great traction. And they clean up effortlessly—just machine wash.
feature_bullets: Shaft measures approximately low-top from arch
Sneaker featuring lace-up vamp with silver-tone rivets and wrap-around outsole
Logo tag at side;Vulcanised gum sole
Superga sneakers tend to run slightly large. We recommend sizing down by 1/2 size.
Fit tip-we recommend a whole size down from the size you usually take
